verses.roman:
jaya jaya nityānanda jayādvaita-candra
jaya śrīvāsādi jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Lord Nityānanda; jaya advaita-candra—all glories to Advaita Prabhu; jaya—all glories; śrīvāsa-ādi—to all the devotees, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda—all glories unto the devotees of Lord Gaurasundara.
translation: All glories unto Lord Nityānanda and Advaita Prabhu, and all glories unto all the devotees of Lord Caitanya, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura!
